item.title: Goodbye My Friend – Lance Washington (1967-2016)
item.dc:creator: Kevin Ragsdale
item.description:
Lance Washington 1967-2016 I met my best friend, Lance Washington, while we were working at QVC shopping channel almost thirty years ago.  We worked the overnight shift, answering telephones and taking orders.  I had relocated to Pennsylvania from Tennessee, and kept to myself at work (my southern accent meant I had to repeat everything I said […]

The post Goodbye My Friend – Lance Washington (1967-2016) appeared first on Kevin Ragsdale.

item.title: “So, Where Ya Been?”
item.dc:creator: Kevin Ragsdale
item.description:
Over the past year or so, I’ve received a couple of emails from folks asking why my blog had disappeared. Last week, I found a post on Foxite asking “What happened to Kevin Ragsdale?” My response (edited for this post) was: I’m still alive, just been a bit less visible over the last couple of years due to […]

item.title: I Doubled My Productivity With One Simple Step
item.dc:creator: Kevin Ragsdale
item.description:
For the last couple of months, I have been dragging. Seems like every day I get just a little bit slower and a little less productive. The last couple of weeks, it’s gotten to the point where I dread getting on the laptop at night, looking for something — anything — to keep me from having to sit […]
